title: Should my next phone be a Huawei? Do you trust this brand? - Quora

response.answer_text: To be honest, phones are just suppose to be there to provide you information and for communication and sometimes entertainment. Huawei phones are cheap overseas and here (much cheaper than apple) so why do you need some kind of super modern model when you just need something that can call, message, have wifi connection etc. Huawei is a great option for kids as they don’t have an App Store with English apps (you’ll need to go through a series of steps to get google play store) so you wont have to worry about overspending on games.
When I was in China, all Chinese phones had all Google apps disabled. I think you could download the .apk and install it, but not using the Play Store is annoying. Keep that in mind.
